Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.bp.pacman.Player

public class Player extends Object implements Movable
Player with position, movement, image, points and lifes

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(javafx.scene.paint.Color color, int id, int startPositionX, int startPositionY, int fieldwidth, int fieldheight, int mouthMoving, int lifes)
      creats a player
      Parameters:
      color - color of the player
      id - id of the current player
      startPositionX - x coordinate of the spawnpoint
      startPositionY - y coordinate of the spawnpoint
      fieldwidth - width of the field
      fieldheight - height of the field
      mouthMoving - mouth animation behavior
      lifes - amount of lives
